Chromie.name: Sand Blast
Chromie.description: After 1 second, fire a missile that deals 300 (+2% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit.  Quest: Hit 80 Heroes with Sand Blast. Consecutive hits without missing count as hitting 2 Heroes. Reward: Each Hero hit increases Sand Blast's damage by 5. Reward: After hitting 80 Heroes, casting Sand Blast leaves an Echo behind.  The next time Sand Blast is cast, the Echo also casts an untalented Sand Blast that deals 40% damage.

Chromie.name: Dragon's Breath
Chromie.description: Fire a blast into the air that lands after 1.5 seconds, dealing 480 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in an area.  Enemies cannot see where the blast will land.

Chromie.name: Time Trap
Chromie.description: Place a Time Trap that arms and Stealths after 2 seconds. The first enemy Hero to touch it is placed in Time Stop for 2 seconds. Only 1 trap can exist at once.

Chromie.name: Temporal Loop
Chromie.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

Chromie.name: Slowing Sands
Chromie.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

Chromie.name: Timewalker
Chromie.description: You've traveled to the future, and as such, will learn your Talents 2 levels earlier than your teammates!

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 2, up to 50. Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 150 and also increase Chromie's sight radius by 100%.

1.name: Mounting Sand
1.description: Hitting 3 or more consecutive Sand Blasts without missing counts as hitting 3 Heroes.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds. Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Chromie's Mana Regeneration by 0.1, up to 1.5. Reward: After gathering 15 Globes Chromie also gains 5% Ability Power.

4.name: Bronze Talons
4.description: Increases Chromie's Basic Attack range by 35%. Using Sand Blast increases the damage of her next Basic Attack by 250%.

4.name: Timely Surprise
4.description: Sand Blast and Dragon's Breath's cooldowns are reset when Time Trap is triggered.

7.name: Chrono Sickness
7.description: Reduce Time Trap's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%. After the Time Stop ends, the enemy is also Slowed by 50% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Dragon's Eye
7.description: Dragon's Breath does 25% more damage to enemies in the center.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Reduces Dragon's Breath's Mana cost and cooldown by 50%, but also reduces its damage by 25%.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Place a sand vortex that greatly slows enemies inside it. The longer it is active the more it slows, up to 60% after 3 seconds.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they will teleport back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.

13.name: Bye Bye!
13.description: Reduces the cast time of Hearthstone by 75%, and it is not interrupted by taking damage.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to swap Chromie's position with her Sand Blast Echo.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 7 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Sand Blast travels at least 75% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Ability Power by 20% for 10 seconds.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast grants 8% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 40%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by Sand Blast.

20.name: Andorhal Anomaly
20.description: Time Trap gains 2 charges, and when the cooldown finishes, Chromie gains all charges at once. Maximum 3 active Time Traps.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blast will now hit all Heroes in its path. Additional hits do not grant bonus damage or Quest progress.

20.name: Pocket of Time
20.description: Removes Slowing Sands Mana cost and increases the slow from 60% to 80%.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first.
